text: Eghtɨ gumazitam wainɨn igiam inigh, a isɨva asɨzir inir mɨsevir ghuritam guruighan kogham. A kamaghɨn damightɨ, wainɨn dɨpam gɨn buva anangɨva asɨzir inir ghurir kam abightɨ, wainɨn dɨpam nguazim giregham. Eghtɨ wain ko asɨzir inim vɨrara ikuvigham. A kamaghɨn damuan kogham. A wainɨn igiam inigh asɨzir inir mɨsevir igiamra ruigham.”
